amendment.description: To propose an alternative to section 1083 to improve the Quadrennial Defense Review.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4489 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4489 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6381-6382) To propose an alternative to section 1083 to improve the Quadrennial Defense Review.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4489 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4489 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bayh.
